Fortnite is a popular online video game that was developed by Epic Games. The game was released in 2017 and has since become incredibly popular. Fortnite is a battle royale game that features a wide range of heroes and villains battling it out to be the last person standing. 

## Gameplay

The gameplay in Fortnite is fairly simple. Players are dropped onto a map and must scavenge for weapons and resources while also avoiding other players. The last person, duo, or team standing wins the game. The game can be played solo, with a partner, or in squads up to four players.

## Features

One of the unique features of Fortnite is the ability to build structures. Players can create walls, stairs, and floors to protect themselves from other players or to gain a height advantage. The building mechanic adds an extra layer of strategy to the game and makes it stand out from other battle royale games.

Fortnite also features an in-game store where players can purchase skins, emotes, and other cosmetic items. These items do not give players any advantage in the game, but they are a fun way to customize your character.

## Cross-Platform Play

Fortnite is available on a wide range of platforms, including PC, Xbox, PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, and mobile devices. One of the great features of the game is cross-platform play. This means that players on different platforms can play together in the same game. This feature has helped to make Fortnite a truly global game.

## Conclusion

Fortnite is an incredibly fun and engaging game that has taken the world by storm. The game's fast-paced action, unique building mechanics, and cross-platform play make it a must-play for video game fans of all ages. Whether you are a seasoned gamer or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, Fortnite is definitely worth checking out.
